unnormalised: **EV Charging Gets a Festive Boost – Just in Time for Onam Travel!**
normalised: E V Charging Gets a Festive Boost – Just in Time for Onam Travel!

unnormalised: Bangalore: Forget range anxiety, folks! EV charging infrastructure is finally getting a serious upgrade just as families gear up for Onam trips. IIT Madras researchers have announced a breakthrough in fast-charging technology, promising to cut charging times by a whopping 40%.
normalised: Bangalore: Forget range anxiety, folks! E V charging infrastructure is finally getting a serious upgrade just as families gear up for Onam trips. I I T Madras researchers have announced a breakthrough in fast-charging technology, promising to cut charging times by a whopping forty percent.

unnormalised: Meanwhile, Ather Energy is planning to install new charging grids along popular routes from Chennai to Kerala, specifically targeting areas where families are likely to stop for a quick biryani break. Imagine, plugging in while you grab a plate of spicy goodness!
normalised: Meanwhile, Ather Energy is planning to install new charging grids along popular routes from Chennai to Kerala, specifically targeting areas where families are likely to stop for a quick biryani break. Imagine, plugging in while you grab a plate of spicy goodness!

unnormalised: These charging stations will be strategically located near Amma Unavagam outlets and other family-friendly restaurants. Tata Power is also jumping on the bandwagon, pledging Rs. 25 crore investment in EV charging infrastructure across Tamil Nadu.
normalised: These charging stations will be strategically located near Amma Unavagam outlets and other family-friendly restaurants. Tata Power is also jumping on the bandwagon, pledging rupee twenty five crore investment in E V charging infrastructure across Tamil Nadu.

unnormalised: Experts predict this will boost EV sales significantly, especially as more people consider EVs for their long festival commutes. One thing's for sure: no more sweating about running out of juice 100 km from Coimbatore. Happy Onam! Drive safe!
normalised: Experts predict this will boost E V sales significantly, especially as more people consider E V s for their long festival commutes. One thing's for sure: no more sweating about running out of juice one hundred kilometer from Coimbatore. Happy Onam! Drive safe!
